seeding
How in the name of the blue blazes of buggery can you fit this quality of movie into 900Mb?? Very impressive - good film too!
A little pixelated some times, but a decent quality video quality for the size, very good audio quality.
Watching this on my laptop and the video's not really what I'd call crisp, certainly not blu-ray, but the sound quality is beautiful, and the file size is small at least.
